Class CGroup

      • create

        public ShellResult create​(java.lang.String sudoPW)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create the cgroup with all Controllers used.
        Parameters:
        sudoPW - The sudo-password to allow the creation of the cgroup.
        Returns:
        The result of the call for creating the cgroup.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of exceptions when executing cgroup create.
